text: @realDonaldTrump Now,get over the timidity and fear!Those who love their job and their leaders who know and care about them,know how to do  what they do safely,  in the current COVID-19 threat environment!Only they can assure their own safety! Educate them,and let them use their God given talent!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
